Back office team will not be validating the checklist but will restore the numbers as received.&nbsp;Strict action will be taken incase of wrong restoration request</p>

Frequently Asked Questions: <p><strong>What is SIMOSA?</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Simosa is a telecom management and lifestyle application where you can recharge, pay bill, subscribe to a bundle, watch movies, listen to songs and so much more. A jazz user can do end to end self-care while omno users can only do recharge and subscribe to bundles, at launch this service will only be available for zong and ufone.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Why Jazz World is renamed as SIMOSA?</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Jazz World was completely revamped and made brand agonistic to include other telecom network users as well. Moreover, a revamp of jazz world was underway which is why simosa came to life.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Did you changed the name of the App only or also is there anu changes in App features too?</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>There are other changes as well, the UI and UX has been completely revamped, there is a better support and account management section and other telecom operator users can now use the app as well.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>What are the silent features of SIMOSA?</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>The UI and UX has been completely revamped, there is a better support and account management section and other telecom operator users can now use the app as well, there are a lot of lifestyle features a user can use that are playing games, watching movies, listening to songs and much more.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Do we get something Free in SIMOSA App?</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Yes, prepaid users get daily gamified data for free on the app, which in total in a month amounts to 3.4GB of data.</li>
	<li>The app is also zero rated for Jazz users.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Why Jazz world App is not available on Play Store?</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>The Jazz world app has been renamed to simosa and is easily available on the app and play store.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>What is the thought process of Jazz behind this new name SIMOSA?</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Simosa stands for&nbsp;<strong>Sim and OSA-&ldquo;one stop app</strong>&rdquo;. To include the word sim hinting at telecom and OSA stands for one stop app &ndash; so everything telecom is found in this app.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Jazz world App was more user friendly I can&rsquo;t understand SIMOSA easily can I use Jazz world again?</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>No, however we have a support and FAQ section that will answer all your queries and make the app easy for you to use. The purpose of the revamp is to make everything organized, with time you will find the app easy to use and more optimized.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>What do you mean by SIMOSA is for all network telecom operator?</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Ufone, Zong and other network users can also pay bill, recharge, subscribe to bundles now with simosa.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Do I check my other network number call history on SIMOSA?</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>No, you can not check your call history if you are not a Jazz user</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Do I take advance against my other network number via SIMOSA?</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>No, that is not possible.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>How can SIMOSA help the customer to avail long tail e-care GSM services and what are those services for Jazz users?</strong></p>

<p>By downloading the app and logging in via customer&#39;s Jazz number a user can use this features.</p>

<ul>
	<li>Tax Certificate</li>
	<li>International Roaming</li>
	<li>Bill Download</li>
	<li>Complaint Creation</li>
	<li>Account History</li>
	<li>PIN &amp; PUK code</li>
	<li>Balance Share</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>How can SIMOSA help the customer to avail long tail e-care GSM services and what are those services for OMNO users?</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>On SIMOSA, OMNO ecare facility is not avaliable&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>How can SIMOSA enhance lifestyle of Jazz users?</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>On SIMOSA, a user can play games, watch movies, listen to songs, use an Islam section where one can turn on prayer alerts and much more. There are also discounts on simosa for popular shops and eateries.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>How can SIMOSA enhance lifestyle of OMNO users?</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>On simosa a user can play games, watch movies, listen to songs, use an Islam section where one can turn on prayer alerts and much more. There are also discounts on simosa for popular shops and eateries.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Do a customer directly subscribe OMNO packages &amp; bundles via SIMOSA?</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Yes, a customer can directly subscribe using SIMOSA</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Do we enhance recharge limits for Jazz users in SIMOSA?</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>No</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Can I get my Telenor/Ufone/Zong sim blocked via SIMOSA if my sim is lost?</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>No</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Can I get my Telenor/Ufone/Zong sim restored via SIMOSA?</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>No</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Do we get our postpaid number restored on commitment via SIMOSA?</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>No</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Do SIMOSA gives some food discounts or Cashbacks?</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>You can find discounts via simosa for food, no cashbacks as of now</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Service Request Activity: <p><strong>LOV&#39;s for case creation:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li><strong>Type:</strong>&nbsp;Activation Complaints&nbsp;</li>
	<li><strong>Area:</strong>&nbsp;Order-Change offer(Catalog Change)</li>
	<li><strong>Sub Area:</strong>&nbsp;Order-Change offer(Catalog Change)- ROX&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Mention issue detail in Summary field</li>
	<li>Create the Case by clicking OK</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Verify from Memos against the number if order is
	<ul>
		<li>Failed (order execution failed) - Orange icon</li>
		<li>Requested (order execution in process)&nbsp; - Blue icon</li>
		<li>Fulfilled (order executed)&nbsp; - Green icon</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <p><strong>Champion to ROX:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Any remaining incentive of whitelisted bundles (list will be added in KMS) will be carried forward to ROX</li>
	<li>Incentive will be accumulated in Vibe bundle incentive</li>
	<li>In case of open loan on champion, loan need to be cleared for conversion on ROX</li>
	<li>In case of non-whitelisted bundle, upon conversion bundle will be removed and nothing will be carried forward</li>
	<li>There are no charges to ROX</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>ROX to Champion:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Customer can exit ROX anytime from complaint section, by using exit ROX option</li>
	<li>Any remaining incentive of Vibe bundles will be removed</li>
	<li>Active VAS will be removed</li>
	<li>Exclusive to ROX products, Vibe bundle incentives will be removed and will NOT be carried forward to champion</li>
	<li>There are no charges to champion conversion from ROX I.e. Rs.17.93 will NOT be charged</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Incentive Rollover Rules:</strong></p>

<p>Existing incentives of the customer will roll over, as the customer converts from Jazz Prepaid to ROX, as per below mentioned rules:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Off-Net -&gt; All Net</li>
	<li>All-Net -&gt; All Net</li>
	<li>Data Generic -&gt; Data Generic</li>
	<li>SMS -&gt; SMS</li>
	<li>Data Social -&gt; Discarded</li>
	<li>Data Off peak -&gt; Discarded</li>
	<li>On net -&gt; Discarded</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note</strong>:&nbsp;Only for exceptional cases where vibe package is not active on ROX service class then agent will follow below handling:&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Agent will guide self service *337# to customers for package plan conversion (only to those who don&rsquo;t have vibe bundle)</li>
	<li>If customer insists to change upfront then agent will create case in super office as mentioned in process.</li>
</ul>
